text:
@BorisJohnson Does the invite extend to your Home Secretary, you know Priti Patel who hasn't been seen in weeks?!. Why isn't she at the daily briefings explaining what the Governments policy is on travellers returning to the UK who could potentially be carrying the coronavirus.

Is she hiding? https://t.co/JVc7CxQgSL
